short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and inactivate browser tabs to save memory

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and inactivate browser tabs to save memory! You can either inactivate the currently viewed tab, or click "More Tab Options" and bulk inactivate tabs.
